text: The Parallax View is a 1974 American thriller movie directed by Alan J. Pakula. It was written by Lorenzo Semple Jr.. It stars Warren Beatty, Hume Cronyn, William Daniels, Paula Prentiss, Richard Bull, and Kenneth Mars. It was released to positive reviews on June 14, 1974. == Other websites == * Category:1974 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Alan J. title: The Parallax View
